Bug fixes and improvements.

- Added the “Smart Cart” service that allows you to easily shop online from multiple e-shops with a single account & a single payment through Skroutz

- Support the new B2B product family

Bug fixes and improvements.

- You can now check out the most popular categories of Skroutz in a brand new Home Screen. You will also find recent categories & products you've visited.
- Now size selection is available in product pages for Kids&Babies apparel

- General bug fixes and improvements
